It's a new year and I shall do my best to be better about posting in the doll journal. So I decided to start off right and do a post with my current status in Doll-ness. So! on the doll acquisition front: Due to pushing back my trip to Japan, I ended up with some extra funds right in the middle of December... Since all my X-mas shopping was taken care of... what was I to do but splurge on dolls? I have a Heath on layaway~ I've got about $400 more to go and he's mine! I already know I want to repaint him. Actually, it was a repainted Heath that made me love him. I initially didn't like him! Of course I realised how much I wanted him well after he had been sold out and even hard to find on the second hand market. I cannot wait to see what character he will become for me! I have a Latidoll L head coming (X-mas version). Rillystar on DoA was spliting one.... I had missed him the initial time... but then I looked at her thread one day and the buyer for the head had backed out! So I jumped on him. He arrived to her a couple days ago.... which a huge chip out of the back of his head! AUGH! So now we're in process of returning the head and seeing if they can ship it directly to me. =____= I just want my emo puppy~ There is an Unoss body I have on hold too. I'm so addicted to Unoss it's not even funny! =^^;;= And I just bought new hands for the Oldskin SD10 boy body I have sitting in pieces.... the pudgey little hands were annoying me to the point where I didn't even want to LOOK at the body. so I bought the H-06 hands which are considerably less chubby and stubby. I don't really go for the kid look in my SD-sized dolls. I wonder if I will really end up using this body...? the oldskins are well... Not as nice as any of the newer ones. Lastly, I have an AR X-mas kit Dan on the way, though I'm only keeping the body.... So after finding out that the Soah head WILL fit on AR fair boy body, I debated getting one. And then my friend popped up pointing out what a great deal the X-mas dan kit was and how much she wanted the head so we decided to split him! The next day I ordered him >_>; Of course AR has delayed my shipping =___= he was supposed to ship out Dec 17th.... and now I'm told he won't ship until MID January... augh! I'm getting antsy!! On the Project Front: The two Gravity Doll heads are doing quite well! (Please go here to see them) The marketplace on DoA has warmly received them. I need to go pick up the mold-making goods so we can get to casting very soon~ (I just need a weekday off to go pick them up) I am planning on sculpting a special body type. No, I won't say what it will be yet, or why it's special~ I'm just being a tease. There is also another head I want to sculpt once I have time to work on it. Again... being a tease X3 I have a couple clothing commissions I need to finish ASAP! They are a week or so behind schedule due to unforseen family events. And even though both customers are being very understanding of my slowness but I need to finish them! Okay time to thread the sewing machine (after I get off work anyway!) Let see... I also have a full waiting list for clothing commissions. =@__@= I'm leaving myself very busy indeed! I have several heads to paint: For others: WS El Elf ('04, not '06) for a friend NS El Elf Vampire for a friend Then my own dolls to paint/sand/mod: Unoss Aika - sand seams, and paint Soah Boy - faceup Nanuri NS - mod and paint (waiting on eye beveler to arrive) Nanuri WS - mod and paint (waiting on eye beveler to arrive) Unoa Lusis + 2 faceplates - repaint Heath - Faceup (once he arrives) So much to do! Good thing I will soon have a lot more freetime!

In efforts to raise cash for my Holiday trip to Japan, I've made some outfits to sell. I have some stuff up on DOA but I will soon be adding other items up as I clean out my inventory of doll stuff. I will also be making other outfits for SD and MSD sizes. I am also open to reasonable offers on the various items up for sale. Currently on eBay - Butterfly Embrace:
Auction Link: Butterfly Embrace for Him Auction Link: Butterfly Embrace for Her
I also have other items up for sale on Den of Angels~ Please see them here: Clothing: SD and MSD Pearl and Crystal chokers 12mm Eyes and SD-sized Wigs And of course, my commissions thread: Commissions Thread

Ohayo Minna-san~ As I will be leaving for Japan in just a smidgen over 7 weeks, I am opening up to take Doll clothing/accessories comissions and art comissions. Both comission lists are WIDE open with no wait list! While the plane ticket is covered, I still need to pay for booked hotel rooms and food (plus any extra spending cash would be lovely. =^.~=) For information on my Doll outfit comissions please see here: http://www.denofangels.com/forums/showthread.php?t=6149 For information on my Art comissions, please see here: http://brokenpuppet.deviantart.com/ Please spread the news to anyone you think would be interested! Domo!

sorry for the lack of being around...

between moving in less than an a week and having to find new homes for some of our beloved furry pets, I just haven't had much time to deal with Doll-related things...

But my NS Nanuri head arrived today admist the order of wigs, shoes, etc. So I figured that was doll-related and important enough to mention~

Woo

back to work =@____@=

=^_^= Happy~ the Elves arrived yesterday~ And >giggle< Their "welcome home" date is the same as my dad's birthday! I find that highly amusing. I'm patiently waiting for the El to tell me what his name is. Baron said he might keep the name Aramina for the Elf Lishe... but he's still not certain yet. and while I can't find the card reader, here's a really crappy pic that doesn't do the El Elf any justice taken from my camera phone: It's not the wig he came with. But Zephy insisted he's my only silver-haired El... Elf or otherwise.

Two Aikas have made their way into my house =^^= they are beautiful! I can't wait until I have some time to actually play with them. Both are in process of getting sanding (one is just getting some minor touch ups) and face-ups. AX is right around the corner. I'll be bringing Zephy and Ivy. Maybe Cherry. Still not sure if I'll be attending any of the many gatherings... but I plan to take the two of them with me and at least snap some nice shots. And I have a prospective chance of landing an El Elf. The current owner is seriously considering my offer, but hasn't made a firm decision on selling him. Please cross your fingers for me~ Oh. and sometime After AX I have many photos to post up. I have sewed a lot of stuff since, and need to take some nicer photos... but here's one of the items I was comissioned to make; a boy corset~ (the comissionee alredy has it, so I can't offer many other pics):

Shameless Plug~ Gravity Doll (Collaborated shop) will be selling BJD clothing and accessories at Fanime Con 2006! Please visit us in the artist alley for: * MSD and SD sized clothing * Props (specifically bows made by theCrazyOtaku) * Accessories! We would love to see you and your dolls at our table!! Please stop by and say hello and feel free to browse our inventory~! Also!! Does anyone on my FList own a Delf Mini Fee GIRL and is attending Fanime or the Berkeley Garden Gathering(June 6th)? I have a comission for a Mini fee girl outfit and would love to take some measurements!! If you would be comfortable letting me gently handle your dearling I will be very appreciative! Domo arigato gozaimasu!

I seriously want to buy a Fullset Aika (or just the clothing!) If anyone out there has one they are unsure of or any leads on one please please please contact me! I already have a pending transaction for an Unoss by herself, but I really want a FULLSET Aika to match my Seinna. Anyone who's seen my Ivy know she's spoiled rotten. Now I'm looking for an Aika to also spoil too! I'm just as happy to buy the default items off of someone to make my pending Unoss into a fullset OR buy a fullset Aika w/ all default items. She does not have to have the original face-up or the eye molded brows/lashes, BUT she must be in good condition! Here is my WTB thread: http://denofangels.com/forums/showthread.php?t=63626 As for the items for sale: Of course always see my Sale thread: http://denofangels.com/forums/showthread.php?t=32378 But the newest item added is "Sinister Sister" For Unoss, or Luts Delf Mature Girl. The outfit comes with the Bustier top, paneled waist skirt, caplet, 2 wrist cuffs, and discontinued Luts boy boots (boots are new, only worn for the pictures). The doll, wig, eyes, thigh socks and white panties are not included Asking $150 And of course I take comissions. Please see my Comissions thread for details: http://denofangels.com/forums/showthread.php?t=6149 Woo! I'm an advertising whore!

wow... Makes me feel good.

Apparently talking about my BJD to a co-worker of mine has inspired her to start going after the doll she's been wanting her whole life... literally! She's wanted this doll since she was five. So no... it's not a BJD she's going after, but a large German Sasha doll from her childhood. She'd always put it off as being an unneccesary purchase since she is an adult, and it's a doll. But she's had the small Sasha since she was a little girl and still keeps it by her bed. Apparently my BJD have convinced her that dolls are *not* just for children. 

That just makes me happy, because she came over to my desk telling me how she's going to closely follow an auction to try and win this doll!

Whee!!
My Elf Yder arrived! (unfortunately I'm at work, so no pics until I get home~)

And then a few hours later, my roommates' Mini El came!
XD
Happy Doll delivery day!

I guess my new boy is coming to Katsu! (much doll paintint to ensue tonight!)
<3<3<3

So, reading through this thread:
http://denofangels.com/forums/showthread.php?t=46693

And well, I remember the same thing happening when the Shooter outfits came out a few months back.

I can understand why DoA would want to censor such topics on their forum since there are so many different types of doll-owners out there. But. Personally, I don't see it as offensive. I don't understand WHY it's so horrible to have historical references (Or even just something close) to the point where someone will swear off every buying from a company because of it. It's not that I don't understand the horrors that went on for that time period with officers wearing those uniforms, BUT, just like people who are not Christian don't cringe at the sight of a cross (Come on now, Crusades??). Not to mention as a Korean and I should hate every Chinese or Japanese person for the hundreds of years of rape, war, pillaging, etc. But I don't. Maybe the problem is that it's not "Old" enough. But then I think about that too, and we Buy Japanese-made dolls.. Japanese... the "Yellow-Nazis." 

Though, I'm not for hanging tons of swastikas everywhere or pronoucing Nazism is okay. Far from, actually. I don't think any group that openly wants another group to be harmed/enslaved/erradicated is "Okay." But as it is a historical uniform, and even more historical symbol (Buddhism), I like knowing about it and seeing it's availability as a Historical Clothing piece. Nothing more. 

I love historical costumes, so it makes me sad to see that some people aren't able to just turn away and resign themselves to not buying it if they don't like it. But instead have to vehemothly protest it and make it into an uncomfortable item for those who had nothing against it in the first place. I would personally rather have awareness over censorship. Though, I am not saying having negative feelings towards said item is "wrong." It's an opinion. But it gets to the point where it gets banned for other people. 

Just my thoughts on the matter, and I welcome any sort of Mature discussion on it, since I expect people I know to either have a similar opinion or an opposite one. My thoughts here are just an opinion. Valid, even if not agreed with.

damnit.
I hate insomnia. I really do.
But here I am... At work. And completely exhausted. It's been a week now. Not that this is abnormal... seems like ever 1-2 months I get a period where I can't sleep for about a week. I try to lay down around midnight... but then I can't fall asleep until about 3am. Then my sleep is restless at best. I think I would have gotten past it over the weekend, except we had a guest stay over... which makes it so I can't sleep. I feel like such a zombie today...

but...

>wiggles toes<
Luts sent me an email saying they'd received my payment~ so now just gotta wait for the ship notification. >anxious!< besides that... My friend went to ALA over the weekend and picked up some vermillion HG eyes for Noelle~ <3 that boy is getting so spoiled and he doesn't even have a body yet. Though... thinking about a cosplay for my dolls made me realize... Zephy is my only large boy who's not BW. =x So that strikes out a few cosplays for the time being.

And... I'm WAY not prepped for KatsuCon! Seriously... SO much to get done. I wish Insomnia worked to my advantage to getting things done... but it makes it 100% hard to concentrate. in the day when I'm at work I want to just sleep... at home my mind is alert... Reminds me of when I took the caffiene pills the one time and I was so jittery I couldn't sit down and do anything.

and I ramble. So probably best just to stop this now.

Wow I'm tired today.
Working on new project at work + Insomnia + excitement of ordering Elf Yder yesterday = One tired Spork. Not to mention I've still got a couple sewing commissions I'm WAY behind on. those are getting done this weekend after handing off all the neccessaries to friends traveling down to Anime LA. >So tired< If I ever agree to MAKE bias tape again, shoot me.

So work.. I spent 11 hours at work yesterday (got in early, left late)... Though, I did manage to scrounge about 10 minutes of time at work to order Yder... I guess I could go into story about that.

So. 6:30pm is when they went on sale. Of COURSE I have a conference call meeting at 5:30pm... which meanes it may or may not end at 6-6:15 like it should. Luckily it did, so I ran back up two flights of stairs to my desk, plopped down at the comp and hurriedly got all the items into my cart I was gonna buy (friends + BF asked me to throw in some extras for them). Then it's another 10 minutes until Yder goes on sale... So.. what do I do? Poke around DoA.. the luts site, etc, trying to soothe my nerves a bit before the moment of craziness hits. Then at 6:29pm my co-worker in the cube across from me shouts "hey ----- is headed to your desk to ask about -----" And I'm like "Oh shit!" because well, I'm at work and putting shopping in front of work would be a BIG no-no. So I'm cursing under my breath hoping he gets delayed. The order opens. I throw a BW elf Yder no make up into the cart like a bandit and type my shipping info in a frenzy... And send... Litterally he came to my desk as I was getting my Luts order confirmation email...  And this morning I still keep checking the confirmation email to make sure I didn't screw up! I'm uber glad I threw everything into the cart BEFORE and waited for the sale to open... 1min 30secs was the time I heard for him to sell out. That was SO much faster than the Breakaway (which I think was something like 20+ minutes)...

So now... A boy who's personality and role I haven't even planned will be coming >squee< All I know is he's going to be my Juri Boy's BF... Well, I hope. it really depends if they get along when he arrives. I thought Zephy and Ivy would get along, but they act like mortal enemies... Zephy kind of Ignores Cherry, but Ivy and Lucifer love her. and Lucifer and zephy seem to be co-conspiritors, though Lucifer and Ivy kind of ignore each other. Noelle really doesn't have a body of his own yet... (I need to remedy this for a number of heads..) So he may just steal Lucifer's body for a photoshoot when Unnamed Elf Yder arrives. <3

Also waiting for Leeke wigs to arrive~ I bought two for Noelle~ And his eyeballs. >laugh< though I'm thinking he won't be green-eyed, but I'm a sucker for green eyes.

So, CP just listed up the Elf Yder (Of course just when I was fixing to drive down to the Tenshi no Sumiko and place my FCS order for my F-13 fairy boy. >_> ) So, of course I spent a little time this morning looking at my finances while estimating the cost + shipping. I'm about $100 short. Not that it's really *that* big a problem. BF said I could borrow the last little bit to get him. But... Normal skin or BW? =@___@= I'm tempted to go BW so he'll be a cute match to my BW Juri-boy (I decided my Juri was going to be a boy. >giggle< ) Besides the Elf Yder, and the very obvious want for a MNF El (which I can wait a bit on since he prolly won't be limited) there's the FCS F-13 fairy boy... I'm probably picking the wing ear option... unless I squeal when seeing another set of ears on him. =^^= Which reminds me... I need to go pick out makeup for him so I can bring something down with me for reference when I place my order. Whee. >scoots off< [EDIT] The verdict is now that the Elf Yder will be BW if possible so he and my BW juri can be hot BW elf lovers. >snk< Thanks for that one.

As per my last post, it turns out I'm selling him on DoA. My sister has the same problem with the puffy lower cheeks that I do, so up on DoA he went:

http://denofangels.com/forums/showthread.php?t=41347

If you you anyone you know is interested in a Camine head please check out my thread.

EDIT: Wow... Sold already... that was fast. =o_o;=

As promised, here's the face up I did for the camine head: http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v651/sporkninja/BJD/camine/camine2.jpg http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v651/sporkninja/BJD/camine/camine3.jpg http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v651/sporkninja/BJD/camine/camine4.jpg http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v651/sporkninja/BJD/camine/camine5.jpg http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v651/sporkninja/BJD/camine/camine6.jpg He looks better than the naked head... But I still can't bring myself to love him. I really, really dislike his mouth and the low puffiness of his cheeks. >_< I am not saying it's a *bad* or *ugly* sculpt... DoD's work is well known. But he's really just not what I wanted or thought he'd be from the product pictures. Well, I'm bringing him to work to show my sister tomorrow. She *might* give him a home if she likes it (She's had the same initial problem I had with the general look of the face upon first seeing it). If she doesn't like him, I'm putting him in the marketplace.

And I'm sad to say I'm disappointed....

It's not a bad head, it's just not to my tastes... So, what don't I like? the nose is a bit pointer than I thought... the cheeks are lower and puffier than expected, the lips are more pursed than I thought they'd be... And I must be spoiled by Luts ears... 'cause these ones look really flat and unrealistic to me. (I really LOVE the way luts does ears) And over all the face just looks.... Longer than I expected. Overall, he's nice looking, just not quite what I wanted. 

Well, I'm going to paint him up and see if I can love him after he's painted.... but I can definitely say it was not the 'love at first sight' experience that my other two boys gave me. So, I expect that he'll probably get sold off. I guess next up is saving for the Dolkot Kiss. Since he was the one I was going to use for this vision if Camine didn't turn out to be all I wanted.

=._.= I guess at the very least I can be happy over the fact I *didn't* spring to buy him with the body and all.

So, I'll be gone for the holidays. My plane is leaving tomorrow at 9am (ugh). I've avoided flying around the holidays until this year. I'm *not* looking forward to the hell that will be flying. >___< I hate flying already. Bah.
I'm tempted to bring one of my dolls to show my family. Dad actually said he'd buy me one for my B-day =*___*= (I sent him a list of a bunch of doll stuff I wanted for X-mas, but then he said he could buy me a doll for my birhtday. Boo May, you're too far away!) it'll be funny... it'll be my first FULL doll that's a gift. (My sweety got me the El vampie head who still needs a body. =x_x=)
I have this desire to get a Yder special just to customize the heck out of too...
Wow. my brain's just jumping around all over the place.

....

I think that was everything. >wills work to be over to go home and work on stuffs<

Okies... So many dolls this weekend! here's some threads I posted pictures to: Tea party meet: http://denofangels.com/forums/showthread.php?t=37382&page=2 JTAF: http://denofangels.com/forums/showthread.php?t=37717 And from the archive! I found images of when I had recently received my Lusis, Cherry. Dolls, boys, and TV. XD XD

=^^=
I'm finally openly taking comissions again:
http://denofangels.com/forums/showthread.php?t=6149

I'm in a good mood. =^^=
Finally the much debated over name for the Breakaway was accepted. So he is now Lucifer (Understand I have no religious inclinations. My boyfriend, however, does. Hence why there was much debate over it.) For those who don't wish to address him by his name, his nicknames are Luce or Cifer (Though my BF has already taken to calling him Lucy or Lulu).

Also, <lj user="aiebon">'s holiday photos have made me want to take some of my own. I've got so many additions to the resin family this year it's gonna be a fun little photoshoot. I still need to figure out what to get them each for Christmas! Well, I guess Cherry got goggles... Lucifer is well, here. Ivy got shoes not too long ago... Man. I'm terrible at just giving them everything as soon as it comes! =o Spoiled brats. Well, actually both the boys are getting the Xmas shoes. So.. That counts. Heehee. I'm odd though. I really have no Christmas spirit.. like, none. Yesterday we went to the mall and I got all angsty even. I've never liked the holiday season... but the thought of making a Happy Christmas for my dolls makes me smile.

Back onto one topic... I was thinking of doing a 12 days of Christmas photoshoot, since the 12 days occurs *after* Christmas and I'll actually be gone for the Holidays anyway. =^^;;= Then again, there's the BJD tarot desk that Re-surfaced... I had wanted to do it originally... But ended up not having time. Well, we'll see. 

It's strange... I finally want to take photos of them again. For a while, I was just not wanting to take any photographs of my Resin dearlings, even though I was still playing with them. I have so many little couches and shelves they sit on that they are rarely in the boxes or carry bags. (crud! just remembered I have to make pillows for Cherry's carry bag since AlchemicLab doesn't give pillows in their boxes!)

Oh~ and I have ideas for at least 4 different outfits right now... and a couple comissions... so as long as I get off my lazy butt and sew things, expect pictures! If these turn out nicely, I'm thinking I'll finally accept clothing comissions for dolls. (I've been doing so many faceups lately I'm starting to wonder if I should open and esthetics shop!)

Anyway. Just some random thoughts.

Nya ha ha~
I corrupted yet another: http://www.livejournal.com/users/tonihime/280430.html
I should start keeping a list of how many people I've gotten into BJDs (to the point where they purchased!). I believe at least 4 already. XD

On a very random note... I'm finally in the mood to take lots of pictures of my darlings again. I was in a slump of not wanting to make anything for them and not wanting to take pictures of them, even though I still had them out on display and played with them quite often.

I am very excited about the tea party on Saturday~ <3 I can't wait to take pictures of all the beauties that will be there. <3 But bloody hell!! How am I gonna get things made for my Dearlings? Ivy's got an outfit she can wear... I need to finish Cherry's shirt. But the two boys have nothing to wear! Well, I could probably put one of them in the cute Dollmore school uniform I have. But... what about the other. My poor breakaway doesn't even have a wig of his own yet. It won't arrive until my BF's order gets shipped (we hear sometime next week!) =._.= sadness! (not to mention the poor thing doesn't have a faceup or a name yet... the first name was shot down.) well, maybe I'll get to work on him tonight, his heads got sanded and coated yesterday, so they are ready for painting today (does anyone else find working a full time job is a drag on trying to get doll stuff done?)

On a happy note: The goggles I ordered in the group order came today... sadly, both were red when I orderd blue lenses for the larger set, *but* at least I like red, so I don't think I'll be sending them back. I'll see if my boy even likes them, then decide if I'll order another pair in blue.

So, selling two things: A Blue Sherling Coat, and a white SD-girl outfit.

And the white outfit:
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v651/sporkninja/whiteoutfit.jpg

DoA is down for me again, so pre-emptively posting it up here. Got it as an extra outfit with Ivy, but it's not her style. The top and pants were obviously made for an SD/SD13 girl, not a Unoss because the pants are just a little tight in the hips and the top is way loose. Buttons and zippers really work, which to me is a bit of a pain, but someone else might like that. The top has a separating zipper, but I am unable to get it to open. [edit]We got the zipper open and it works fine. I'm just not forceful enough apparently.
$25 + S&H for top, pants, belt. Hanger not included.

Lots of you asked where I got the blue coat. Well, I made it, and since it's not *exactly* what I wanted, I'm selling it on the DoA market place. buy my stuff! (shameless plug) =^^=

http://www.denofangels.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=14846&start=0

gah!
I've been so terrible on keeping up with ANYTHING online! Actually, work's been keeping me so busy that I just haven't had time to go online. Hey everyone!

Just a quick pop-in to say I'm still alive. Work's been keeping me uber busy, so my poor unnamed Unoss hasn't had her face fully painted. =( I've also had no time to upload and touch up the pictures I took of Zephy in the snow. =/

Sorry that I have no kept up on everyone's journals! If you have exciting doll news (new arrives/face-ups/cute pics) comment here and point me out to the post. =D

I will throw a couple quick notes out there: My Unoss is fully sanded and restrung (I have to coat the poor dear... must get more MSC).. well, except her head, which is still detached for painting. (I have a few rather disturbing pictures of my Ball Jointed family including the return of the un-named Isao head!). So I've got some before and after shots of her body for sanding. <3 On that note, my BF says Unoss's resin is softer than Zephy's because it was much easier to sand. But continuing on the update news... Zephy now has a grey armchair, and I have this cute rocking bench that two can sit on. So cute! And I paid all of $18 for BOTH of them. XD I'm selling off Zephy's new coat because it's just a *tad* tight for him so I'm going to make him a new one. Will post on DoA when I get the pics uploaded.

Anyways. I think that's all. =^.^=

It seems my keeper has gone nuts again. She and I left for Tahoe with Baron for a few days - which was just dreadful because she left me alone in the room all day by myself on Monday. I was quite upset... but then she handed me a new coat she made for me. So I guess it was okay. I also got to play in the snow, which was pleasant. Building a snowman is fun. But then on the way home, she frantically insisted we stop by her work. And when we did, she came back witha very large package. But of course she wouldn't tell me what it was. So I had to wait until we got home to find out. So, after arriving home, she finally (after several delays of her insisting she had to put things away) started opening the huge box. It was very strange, because when she opened the box, there was ... well. it looked like a mummy... Only wrapped in bubble wrap. I was rather perplexed. After much picture taking and bubble-wrap removal I finally discovered a person inside! I was both interested and disappointed. I was expecting that my poor companion head would finally have a body, but no, this one had breasts and... rather large hips... her hands and feet are far from small and dainty also. ...Needless to say, I was a little disappointed... Especially when I got sat on the shelf while Spork cooed over this monstrocity of a woman.... Well. To shorten what Zephy said, Eee! My Unoss arrived! I don't have a name for her yet, and I'll have to upload pics tonight when I'm off of work (>looks at clock< Augh! 8.5 more hours to go!). I'm currently re-doing her face. <3 Some things that were surprizing... her hands are larger than Zephy's. (I think someone joked about them being "man-hands") So are her feet, but just a little. She's got such gorgeous legs, hips, breasts.... but. her hips and legs are quite large! (she's got birthin' hips!!). Also, I remember how Zephyrus arrived and he had some seams, but oh MAN Unoss' seams are HUGE. =@___@= Lots and lots of sanding. Even her hands and feet need a good dose of sanding. While beautifully shaped, they have some serious sanding needed. The head mechanism is... interesting. I'm still getting the hang of using it. Her eyes are beautiful... but I think having to tape her head shut is a little strange for me... =^^;= I am in love with her little robot headgear. It's so cute!! But... It's a little hard to keep her wig sitting properly with the headgear on. So I'm not sure what to do there. I'm also not sure what to do about getting new wigs/eyes for her... the springs in the eye-mechanism are so small that I don't think most eye-types would work with them. =/ Kind of a bummer, but ah well! I like her default eyes enough so I don't think I'll worry about it too much. I mostly want to get her a new wig because I didn't see her being a blonde. >sigh!< Being at work right now is excruciating!! I just wanna go home and play with my dolls! It's so much of the 'new-doll' tasks right now... sanding.. painting... Her persona is slowly shining out to me. >happy sigh!<

So, this is an older photo story, but never one I posted. It's when my Isao head arrived. Zephyrus: What's this? A box full of bubblewrap? Me: Something like that. there's a present for you inside. Zephryus: Present? For me? is it more clothes? New eyes? A wig? Me: Just open it. Zephryus: Don't mind if I do >starts digging< Zephryus: AHHHHH! There's a disembodied head!! Me: He's a new friend... well. When he gets a body. Zephyrus: ........You gave me a disembodied head. Me: Future friend. Friend. Zephryus: You humans are really sick. Remind me to give you some random disembodied limb when your birthday rolls around. Me: =^^;= Morale of the story: Wait until all parts have arrived before introducing your BJDs to purchases.

Lost second Unoss auction in a row. Poooooo.
I should really stop because well... It's both stressful and depressing trying to bid on a doll (the depressing part is losing), but then I keep thinking about her and ugh. Which is funny, but I haven't really found myself drawn to many of the female dolls (like, maybe 2). I don't even care about the default clothes/eyes/wigs. I just love her face and body sculpt. I am even highly amused over the fact that my boyfriend wants me to win her as much as *I* want to. He thinks she's the prettiest doll he's ever seen (and he likes considerably more of the females than I do). He even bought me 7 yards of this gorgeous material to make a Kimono out of. One for me AND enough to make her a matching one.

So if anyone has any leads on a Unoss, please do contact me.

Dear fellow BJD friends, I am happy to have a journal created for me so that I may let my thoughts and happenings be known to you all. While I currently have nothing current to tell, I welcome you all. Enjoy your stay. -Zephyrus Disclaimer Zephyrus is a Ball Joint Doll which I own. I am using this journal to interact with other BJD owners. I do not appreciate trolling or flaming. If anything in this journal offends you, then please stop reading it. I will not take down posts, but I will delete flaming comments. Please respect my journal. If you want to seriously inquire about my doll, then please do. I have no problem answering genuine questions. But if you see somthing you don't like/understand/appeciate, then refrain from commenting and just move along in LJ land. If you're trying to rile me up, then please know right now that flames and trolling do not upset me. To other BJD owners, I welcome you to friend this journal and read and comment! If you see someone flaming this journal, please ignore it. I'll delete it and it will be gone. There is no need to get worked up over the disrespect of others. Thank you. -Sporkninja
